title: Progression Schema
description: Schema for chord progression and key progression files in the Piano App. Supports both Roman numeral chord progressions (e.g., 'I IV V I') and key progressions with note names (e.g., 'C F Bb Eb').

id.description: A unique identifier for the progression (UUID). Optional, can be generated if not provided.

progression.description: Progression string. Can be Roman numeral chord progressions (e.g., 'I IV V I', 'ii7 V7 I vi') or space-separated musical note names (e.g., 'C F Bb Eb').
examples: C F Bb Eb Ab Db Gb B E A D G

createdAt.description: Creation timestamp in milliseconds. Optional, can be generated if not provided.

scaleType.description: Target scale type for this progression (e.g., 'major', 'minor', 'natural_minor')

tags.description: Optional array of tags for categorizing the progression

key.description: Root key for the progression (e.g., 'C', 'F#', 'Bb'). Used primarily for Roman numeral chord progressions.
